resources.string: Places the call automatically once the dial in options are selected. Turn off to enable support for custom dialers.
About the app and its design.
Default pause length (in seconds) between codes when dialing, up to 12 seconds. This setting can be overriden when creating or modifying a bridge.
A conference call line management tool for Android 4.1 and above.

Join My Bridge makes use of the following libraries:
 
FloatingActionButton by makovkastar 
ListViewAnimations by nhaarman 
MaterialEditText by rengwuxian 
MaterialDesignLibrary by navasmdc
Send the developer questions, feature requests, and/or suggestions.
